padcms.magazine.page.elementview

Class SlideElementView

  • java.lang.Object
    • padcms.magazine.page.elementview.BaseElementView
      • padcms.magazine.page.elementview.SlideElementView

  • public class SlideElementView
extends BaseElementView
    slide Slide is a multiple field which may be PDF / HTML or PNG/JPEG. On each slide it’s possible to associate an optional video file, which will be launched from a PDF or HTML using local://video. Minimum number of slides is 2 and maximum is 10. Pagination will be generated automatically. resource (string) relative path to the resource video (string) relative path to the video
